statements: SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE student_id = 3
SELECT student_name, age FROM students WHERE grade_level = 'Senior'
SELECT student_id, learning_behavior FROM students WHERE learning_patterns LIKE '%visual%'
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level = 'A' ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, age, grade_level FROM students WHERE age BETWEEN 15 AND 17 AND grade_level = 'B';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE learning_behavior LIKE '%active%' ORDER BY student_name ASC, age DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, age FROM students WHERE learning_patterns IS NOT NULL AND learning_behavior = 'attentive' ORDER BY age ASC, student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A';
SELECT student_name, grade, age FROM Students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT behavior_id, student_id, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM StudentBehavior WHERE behavior_type = 'positive' ORDER BY behavior_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(age) as average_age FROM Students GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(age) > 20;
SELECT student_name FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, age FROM Students WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY age DESC;

SELECT student_name, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM Students JOIN StudentBehavior ON Students.student_id = StudentBehavior.student_id WHERE Students.grade = 'B' AND StudentBehavior.behavior_type = 'Good' ORDER BY behavior_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM StudentBehavior WHERE behavior_date > '2022-01-01' AND behavior_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY behavior_date;

SELECT student_name, COUNT(behavior_id) AS total_behavior_count FROM Students JOIN StudentBehavior ON Students.student_id = StudentBehavior.student_id GROUP BY student_name HAVING total_behavior_count > 5 ORDER BY total_behavior_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE age > 20;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, progress_status FROM student_progress WHERE completion_date IS NULL;
SELECT student_name, age FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE age > 18;
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress_status FROM students s JOIN student_progress sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = sp.course_id;

SELECT student_name, instructor_name, start_date FROM students s JOIN student_progress sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN courses c ON c.course_id = sp.course_id WHERE progress_status = 'Completed';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE start_date <= '2022-12-31' AND end_date >= '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM students ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_teacher FROM courses WHERE course_credits > 3;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = 100;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_date, behavior_description FROM behaviors ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level >= 10 ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level IN (9, 11) ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_teacher, course_credits FROM courses WHERE course_credits > 3 ORDER BY course_credits DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_name, grade FROM enrollments JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, age, gender FROM students WHERE grade_level > 10;
SELECT course_name, teacher_id, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, score FROM students INNER JOIN assessments ON students.student_id = assessments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, behavior_description, behavior_date FROM students JOIN learning_behaviors ON students.student_id = learning_behaviors.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, age, gender FROM students WHERE age > 15 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM courses WHERE teacher_id = 101;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(*) AS enrollments_count FROM enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT student_name, behavior_description, behavior_date FROM students s JOIN learning_behaviors l ON s.student_id = l.student_id;
